Articles.Content: [You were getting 20 seconds of weirdness while your leg is being fixed]

(oh yeah, lol)

Very well, go ahead...
And you were going on a first date or something (IDK)

Computer, project a pulse of 5 micrograms of fixated Verterons at an interval of 1.02 BPS for 20 seconds.

Feel the bugs yet?
yes, \*takes a deep breath\* they're there!
It's only 10 more seconds! Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Resist the urge to scratch
\*nods, grits teeth and hold arms of chair a little tighter\*

Aaaaand! These are the longest 10 seconds of all time!

There! ...Well, you can walk now.
Page 99!!!!
\*moves leg hesitantly before getting up, then slowly starts to put more weight on it\* This...this is amazing! \*falls to the ground and begins to cry from all of the emotions in him\*
Does it still hurt? That should be right... Do you need another dose?
Jumps in escape pod and ejects towards a black hole

Thank you! but, why? When we had last encountered each other, you would have done anything to destroy me, why then just, fix me?

- - - Updated - - -

This is the first time in two years I have been able to actually move without pain!
Now now, you said you wouldn't talk about that anymore [offscreen] I'm here now, and here to stay.
(I truly am unsure of what to type now...)
[uh oh. This may be a problem...]
You type "now" by hitting the "n" key, then the "o" key, then the "w" key.
\*static comes from the communications panel\* Shuttle Esternia? Shuttle Esternia? Are you there? This is the Citadel.

(Stupid autocorrect)

- - - Updated - - -

Yay more booms!

- - - Updated - - -

I take the escape pod, then sabotage the engines.

I'm the evil one now!

I better head back to my shuttle. Vincent, prepare the doors. I'm coming in soon.

Well, if we see our friends again, I'll relay tactical information from the front lines.
Alright...
Mention that I am insane and dangerous
\*thinks to himself\* HOW am I going to explain this to the council?
Don't. Recover me instead.

Great job, Vincent. Have you collected any data on the Krynns?

I have. Primary structure is composed of: Quadllneutronium. Weaponry is unknown. Propulsion is grav-

Hold... Did you say Quadllneutronium...?

This might be a challenge...
